titles.title: Requesting the Senate to return to the House of Representatives House Joint Resolution 76.
Requesting the Senate to return to the House of Representatives House Joint Resolution 76.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to request that the Senate return to the House H.J. Res. 76 (grants congressional consent and approval for Virginia, Maryland, and the District of Columbia to enter into an interstate compact relating to the establishment of the Washington Metrorail Safety Commission.)
